00035 namespace pwiz {
00036 namespace msdata {

00039 /// represents a tag-value pair, where the tag comes from the controlled vocabulary
00040 struct PWIZ_API_DECL CVParam
00041 {
00042     CVID cvid;
00043     std::string value;
00044     CVID units;
00045 
00046     CVParam(CVID _cvid, float _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00047     :   cvid(_cvid), 
00048         value(boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(_value)),
00049         units(_units)
00050     {}
00051 
00052     CVParam(CVID _cvid, double _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00053     :   cvid(_cvid), 
00054         value(boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(_value)),
00055         units(_units)
00056     {}
00057 
00058     CVParam(CVID _cvid, int _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00059     :   cvid(_cvid), 
00060         value(boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(_value)),
00061         units(_units)
00062     {}
00063 
00064     CVParam(CVID _cvid, long _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00065     :   cvid(_cvid), 
00066         value(boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(_value)),
00067         units(_units)
00068     {}
00069 
00070     CVParam(CVID _cvid, unsigned int _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00071     :   cvid(_cvid), 
00072         value(boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(_value)),
00073         units(_units)
00074     {}
00075 
00076     CVParam(CVID _cvid, unsigned long _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00077     :   cvid(_cvid), 
00078         value(boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(_value)),
00079         units(_units)
00080     {}
00081 
00082     CVParam(CVID _cvid, std::string _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00083     :   cvid(_cvid), 
00084         value(_value),
00085         units(_units)
00086     {}
00087 
00088     CVParam(CVID _cvid, const char* _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00089     :   cvid(_cvid), 
00090         value(_value),
00091         units(_units)
00092     {}
00093 
00094     /// special case for bool (no lexical_cast)
00095     CVParam(CVID _cvid, bool _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00096     :   cvid(_cvid), value(_value ? "true" : "false"), units(_units)
00097     {}
00098 
00099     /// constructor for non-valued CVParams
00100     CVParam(CVID _cvid = CVID_Unknown)
00101     :   cvid(_cvid), units(CVID_Unknown)
00102     {}
00103 
00104     ~CVParam();
00105 
00106     /// templated value access with type conversion
00107     template<typename value_type>
00108     value_type valueAs() const
00109     {
00110         return !value.empty() ? boost::lexical_cast<value_type>(value) 
00111                               : boost::lexical_cast<value_type>(0);
00112     } 
00113 
00114     /// convenience function to return string for the cvid 
00115     std::string name() const;
00116 
00117     /// convenience function to return string for the units 
00118     std::string unitsName() const;
00119 
00120     /// convenience function to return time in seconds (throws if units not a time unit)
00121     double timeInSeconds() const;
00122 
00123     /// equality operator
00124     bool operator==(const CVParam& that) const
00125     {
00126         return that.cvid==cvid && that.value==value && that.units==units;
00127     }
00128 
00129     /// inequality operator
00130     bool operator!=(const CVParam& that) const
00131     {
00132         return !operator==(that);
00133     }
00134 
00135     bool empty() const {return cvid==CVID_Unknown && value.empty() && units==CVID_Unknown;}
00136 };
00137 
00138 
00139 /// functor for finding CVParam with specified exact CVID in a collection of CVParams:
00140 ///
00141 /// vector<CVParam>::const_iterator it =
00142 ///     find_if(params.begin(), params.end(), CVParamIs(MS_software));
00143 ///
00144 struct PWIZ_API_DECL CVParamIs 
00145 {
00146     CVParamIs(CVID cvid) : cvid_(cvid) {}
00147     bool operator()(const CVParam& param) const {return param.cvid == cvid_;}
00148     CVID cvid_;
00149 };
00150 
00151 
00152 /// functor for finding children of a specified CVID in a collection of CVParams:
00153 ///
00154 /// vector<CVParam>::const_iterator it =
00155 ///     find_if(params.begin(), params.end(), CVParamIsChildOf(MS_software));
00156 ///
00157 struct PWIZ_API_DECL CVParamIsChildOf
00158 {
00159     CVParamIsChildOf(CVID cvid) : cvid_(cvid) {}
00160     bool operator()(const CVParam& param) const {return cvIsA(param.cvid, cvid_);}
00161     CVID cvid_;
00162 };
00163 
00164 
00165 /// special case for bool (no lexical_cast)
00166 /// (this has to be outside the class for gcc 3.4, inline for msvc)
00167 template<>
00168 inline bool CVParam::valueAs<bool>() const
00169 {
00170     return value == "true";
00171 }

00174 PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const CVParam& param);
